```{r}
mydata<- read.table("../data/student_info.csv",sep=";",header=TRUE)

n<- dim(mydata)[1]
set.seed(3435)
trainIndicator<-rbinom(n, size=1, prob=0.5)
train_data<- mydata[trainIndicator,]
val_data<-mydata[!trainIndicator,]
val_data
```
